message: More portals.... unsure if this is good or bad. I don't want to have to run steam, orrigin, M$ portal, etc.
fuck you very much EA.  Oh well, I'll see how it goes.  probably just buy it retail and attach it to my Steam account, lawl

EA has pulled itself off of the steam network. I think they are likely to go head to head with steam to be the platform of choice. Not sure how this will play out. EA has a lot of games to use as exclusives. will 3rd party developers use both  Steam and orrigin?
also, will EA make exclusive deals with developers? I don't see that as out of the question
That's far more likely imo. EA is like the Microsoft of game studios.
